document_data.name: ''Blooded Greataxe''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''blooded greataxe''''' was a minor [[enchanted]] [[axe]] from the city of [[Elturel]] in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Description: The weapon was covered in brown caked blood from its countless victims, emitting a potent stench of [[iron]].
document_data.Powers: The ''blooded greataxe'' was enchanted to become more deadly, the closer its wielder was to death.
document_data.History: This grim-looking axe was once wielded by a notorious and deranged killer whose deeds were so grim that their name was magically removed from everyone's memories and records. By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the weapon. found its way into the hands of blacksmith [[Dammon]] of Elturel.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Dammon]], a [[tiefling]] smith from the city of Elturel who found shelter in the [[Emerald Grove]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
